title: KOF Meta Information - Multi-Lingual Data Descriptions
text: endnote: {kofdata} made Switzerland can return official two character abbreviations 26 cantons (states).

title: {kofdata} data sources
text: KOF Data API exposes time series data allows KOF partners broader public consume data manually automated fashion. following collections time series data publicly available: KOF Tourism Forecast Summer Season KOF Tourism Forecast Winter Season KOF Tourism Forecast Year KOF Consensus Forecast KOF Globalization index 2018 vintage KOF Globalization index 2019 vintage KOF Main Indicators (KMI) KOF-Baublatt-Ausblick fitted values KOF-Baublatt-Ausblick Realtime KOF innovation survey (PAN) set SBFI KOF Consensus Forecast Dates KOF Consensus Forecast Maximum KOF Consensus Forecast Mean KOF Consensus Forecast Minimum KOF Consensus Forecast Median KOF Consensus Forecast Probabilities KOF Consensus Forecast Standard Deviation KOF Open Government Data Datasets Run list_available_collections() find name collection can use reference particular collection.

title: {kofdata} data sources
text: April 2020, KOF composed list alternative indicators Switzerland available higher frequency common economic indicators. indicators derived publicly available data. Many indicators updated today can consumed throught KOF Data REST API {kofdata} R package. learn visit kofdata.netlify.app

title: Authors and Citation
text: Matthias Bannert. Author, maintainer. Severin Thoeni. Author. Diana Diaz. Contributor.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Bannert M, Thoeni S (2022). kofdata: Get Data 'KOF Datenservice' API. R package version 0.2, https://github.com/KOF-ch/kofdata.
code: @Manual{,   title = {kofdata: Get Data from the 'KOF Datenservice' API},   author = {Matthias Bannert and Severin Thoeni},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.2},   url = {https://github.com/KOF-ch/kofdata}, }

what: Get Data from the KOF Datenservice API
title: Get Data from the KOF Datenservice API
text: Read Swiss time series data KOF Datenservice API. API provides macroeconomic survey data, business cycle macro economic time series Switzerland. package set wrappers around API. kofdata package able consume public information well data needs API token. information data, API KOF Swiss Economic Institute please consult corresponding links.

title: Get Data from the KOF Datenservice API
text: Fire R run install.packages use GUI, got one.

title: Get Data from the KOF Datenservice API
text: easiest way install latest version might completed checks (contains latest, hottest, awesome, exploratory, adventurous features) run: Note use R regularly: order install directly github make sure devtools package installed.

title: Get Data from the KOF Datenservice API
text: Read KOF Barometer R Session. resulting object list time series objects. case ’s named list length 1 single series queried. can also query vector time series. example read 3 time series KOF labor market index R.
code: tsl <- get_time_series("ch.kof.barometer") length(tsl) # [1] 1 str(tsl) # List of 1 # $ ch.kof.barometer: Time-Series [1:368] from 1991 to 2022: 78.3 69.3 69.5 78 77.9 ... labor <- get_time_series(   c(     "ch.kof.ie.retro.ch_total.ind.d11",     "ch.kof.ie.retro.ch_total.ass.d11",     "ch.kof.ie.retro.ch_total.exp.d11"     )   )    str(labor)   # List of 3 # $ ch.kof.ie.retro.ch_total.ind.d11: Time-Series [1:117] from 1992 to 2022: -19.4 -26.4 # -22.2 -20.4 -17.8 ... #  $ ch.kof.ie.retro.ch_total.ass.d11: Time-Series [1:117] from 1992 to 2022: -25.5 -33.5 # -30.5 -30.1 -28.8 ... # $ ch.kof.ie.retro.ch_total.exp.d11: Time-Series [1:117] from 1992 to 2022: -13.19 -19.31 # -13.96 -10.56 -6.86 ...

title: get_dataset — download_cached_file
text: Download predefined set time series.

title: get_dataset — download_cached_file
get_dataset — download_cached_file
text: username dataservice user name api_key character API key. API key needed accessing non-public timeseries.  downloading public timeseries parameter can omitted. file_to_download name file retrieve. target Path location, store file. NULL, file saved working directory.

title: get_dataset — download_cached_file
Download Pre-Defined collection — get_collection
text: Download predefined collection time series.

title: Download Pre-Defined collection — get_collection
Download Pre-Defined collection — get_collection
text: collection_name name collection wish download. list available collections, go ["list_available_collections"] api_key character API key. API key needed accessing non-public timeseries.  downloading public timeseries parameter can omitted. show_progress collection true, shows progress bar data downloaded.

title: Download Pre-Defined collection — get_collection
Download Pre-Defined Dataset — get_dataset
text: function deprecated. Use get_collection instead. Download predefined set time series.

title: Download Pre-Defined Dataset — get_dataset
Download Pre-Defined Dataset — get_dataset
text: set_name name set wish download. list available sets, go ["list_available_sets"] api_key character API key. API key needed accessing non-public timeseries.  downloading public timeseries parameter can omitted. show_progress set true, shows progress bar data downloaded.

title: List Available collection Names and Their Description — list_available_collections
code: list_available_collections() #>                                                           collection_name #> baro_vintages_monthly                               baro_vintages_monthly #> bs_indicator                                                 bs_indicator #> ch.kof.trsm.fcst.summer                           ch.kof.trsm.fcst.summer #> ch.kof.trsm.fcst.winter                           ch.kof.trsm.fcst.winter #> ch.kof.trsm.fcst.year                               ch.kof.trsm.fcst.year #> ds_consensus_qtr                                         ds_consensus_qtr #> ds_disp_forecasters_qtr                           ds_disp_forecasters_qtr #> ds_globidx_2018_full_fx                           ds_globidx_2018_full_fx #> ds_globidx.v2017                                         ds_globidx.v2017 #> ds_globidx.v2018                                         ds_globidx.v2018 #> ds_globidx.v2019                                         ds_globidx.v2019 #> ds_kmi_mixed_freq                                       ds_kmi_mixed_freq #> ds_kof_baublatt_ausblick_fitted_qtr   ds_kof_baublatt_ausblick_fitted_qtr #> ds_kof_baublatt_ausblick_nowcast_qtr ds_kof_baublatt_ausblick_nowcast_qtr #> ds_kof_baublatt_ausblick_qtr                 ds_kof_baublatt_ausblick_qtr #> ds.sbfi.pan                                                   ds.sbfi.pan #> globalbaro_vintages                                   globalbaro_vintages #> kof_baublatt_ausblick                               kof_baublatt_ausblick #> kof_consensus_forecast                             kof_consensus_forecast #> kof_consensus_forecast_count                 kof_consensus_forecast_count #> kof_consensus_forecast_dates                 kof_consensus_forecast_dates #> kof_consensus_forecast_max                     kof_consensus_forecast_max #> kof_consensus_forecast_mean                   kof_consensus_forecast_mean #> kof_consensus_forecast_median               kof_consensus_forecast_median #> kof_consensus_forecast_min                     kof_consensus_forecast_min #> kof_consensus_forecast_prob                   kof_consensus_forecast_prob #> kof_consensus_forecast_stdev                 kof_consensus_forecast_stdev #> ogd_ch.kof.barometer                                 ogd_ch.kof.barometer #> ogd_ch.kof.bts_total                                 ogd_ch.kof.bts_total #> ogd_ch.kof.esi                                             ogd_ch.kof.esi #> ogd_ch.kof.globalbaro                               ogd_ch.kof.globalbaro #> ogd_ch.kof.ie                                               ogd_ch.kof.ie #> stringency_plus_web                                   stringency_plus_web #> stringency_web                                             stringency_web #>                                                           collection_description #> baro_vintages_monthly                                     KOF Barometer vintages #> bs_indicator                         KOF Geschäftslage Indikator und Subbranchen #> ch.kof.trsm.fcst.summer                       KOF Tourism Forecast Summer Season #> ch.kof.trsm.fcst.winter                       KOF Tourism Forecast Winter Season #> ch.kof.trsm.fcst.year                                  KOF Tourism Forecast Year #> ds_consensus_qtr                                          KOF Consensus Forecast #> ds_disp_forecasters_qtr                                                          #> ds_globidx_2018_full_fx                     KOF Globalization index 2018 vintage #> ds_globidx.v2017                                                                 #> ds_globidx.v2018                            KOF Globalization index 2018 vintage #> ds_globidx.v2019                                                     KOF globidx #> ds_kmi_mixed_freq                                      KOF Main Indicators (KMI) #> ds_kof_baublatt_ausblick_fitted_qtr          KOF-Baublatt-Ausblick fitted values #> ds_kof_baublatt_ausblick_nowcast_qtr              KOF-Baublatt-Ausblick Realtime #> ds_kof_baublatt_ausblick_qtr                               KOF-Baublatt-Ausblick #> ds.sbfi.pan                             KOF innovation survey (PAN) set for SBFI #> globalbaro_vintages                                    Global Barometer vintages #> kof_baublatt_ausblick                                      KOF-Baublatt-Ausblick #> kof_consensus_forecast                                    KOF Consensus Forecast #> kof_consensus_forecast_count                        KOF Consensus Forecast Count #> kof_consensus_forecast_dates                        KOF Consensus Forecast Dates #> kof_consensus_forecast_max                        KOF Consensus Forecast Maximum #> kof_consensus_forecast_mean                          KOF Consensus Forecast Mean #> kof_consensus_forecast_median                      KOF Consensus Forecast Median #> kof_consensus_forecast_min                        KOF Consensus Forecast Minimum #> kof_consensus_forecast_prob                  KOF Consensus Forecast Probabilites #> kof_consensus_forecast_stdev           KOF Consensus Forecast Standard Deviation #> ogd_ch.kof.barometer                                                        <NA> #> ogd_ch.kof.bts_total                                                        <NA> #> ogd_ch.kof.esi           <NA> #> stringency_plus_web                                  for graphics on the webpage #> stringency_web                                              KOF Stringency Index #>                                      is_public #> baro_vintages_monthly                     TRUE #> bs_indicator                              TRUE #> ch.kof.trsm.fcst.summer                   TRUE #> ch.kof.trsm.fcst.winter                   TRUE #> ch.kof.trsm.fcst.year                     TRUE #> ds_consensus_qtr                          TRUE #> ds_disp_forecasters_qtr                   TRUE #> ds_globidx_2018_full_fx                   TRUE #> ds_globidx.v2017                          TRUE #> ds_globidx.v2018                          TRUE #> ds_globidx.v2019                          TRUE #> ds_kmi_mixed_freq                         TRUE #> ds_kof_baublatt_ausblick_fitted_qtr       TRUE #> ds_kof_baublatt_ausblick_nowcast_qtr      TRUE #> ds_kof_baublatt_ausblick_qtr              TRUE #> ds.sbfi.pan                               TRUE #> globalbaro_vintages                       TRUE #> kof_baublatt_ausblick                     TRUE #> kof_consensus_forecast                    TRUE #> kof_consensus_forecast_count              TRUE #> kof_consensus_forecast_dates              TRUE #> kof_consensus_forecast_max                TRUE #> kof_consensus_forecast_mean               TRUE #> kof_consensus_forecast_median             TRUE #> kof_consensus_forecast_min                TRUE #> kof_consensus_forecast_prob               TRUE #> kof_consensus_forecast_stdev              TRUE #> ogd_ch.kof.barometer                      TRUE #> ogd_ch.kof.bts_total                      TRUE #> ogd_ch.kof.esi                            TRUE #> ogd_ch.kof.globalbaro                     TRUE #> ogd_ch.kof.ie                             TRUE #> stringency_plus_web                       TRUE #> stringency_web                            TRUE
